targetUrls.title: Target URLs
targetUrls.description: List of LinkedIn profile or company URLs to scrape. Example: `https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella/` will fetch posted or re-posted content by Bill Gates.

postedLimit.title: Posted Limit (filter)
postedLimit.description: Fetch posts no older than X time. Options: '24h', 'week', 'month'.

maxPosts.title: Maximum number of posts to scrape per each input (overrides pagination)
maxPosts.description: Maximum number of posts to scrape per each profile or company. Default is 10. This overrides pagination. If you set this to 0, it will scrape all posts.

includeQuotePosts.title: Include Quote Posts (shared posts with comments)
includeQuotePosts.description: Include quote posts (shared posts with comments). By default, all posts are scraped.

includeReposts.title: Include Reposts (shared posts without comments)
includeReposts.description: Include reposts (shared posts without comments). By default, all posts are scraped.

maxReactions.title: Maximum number of reactions to scrape per post
maxReactions.description: Maximum number of reactions to scrape per post. Default is 5.

maxComments.title: Maximum number of comments to scrape per post
maxComments.description: Maximum number of comments to scrape per post. Default is 5.

commentsPostedLimit.title: Comments Posted Limit (filter)
commentsPostedLimit.description: Fetch comments no older than X time. Options: '24h', 'week', 'month'.
